project_ids.description: default: empty. will use all projects available to the current authenticated account

service_account_key_json.description: GCP service account key content. Using service accounts is not recommended, but if it is used it is better to use environment or file variable substitution

folder_recursion_depth.description: Number of levels of folders to recurse into. 0 means no recursion, 1 means only immediate children, etc.

project_filter.description: Filter to apply to projects. See https://cloud.google.com/resource-manager/docs/creating-managing-projects#listing_projects_with_a_filter for more information.

backoff_delay.description: Number of seconds to wait before retrying a failed API call. Defaults to 1 second.

backoff_retries.description: Number of times to retry a failed API call. Defaults to 3 retries.

discovery_concurrency.description: Number of concurrent API discovery requests to make. Defaults to 10 concurrent requests.

enabled_services_only.description: If true, only enabled services will be queried. If false, all services will be queried. Defaults to true.

organization_ids.description: List of GCP organization IDs to query

organization_filter.description: Filter to apply to organizations. See https://cloud.google.com/resource-manager/docs/creating-managing-projects#listing_projects_with_a_filter for more information.

concurrency.description: Number of concurrent API requests to make. Defaults to 10 concurrent requests.

scheduler.description: The scheduler to use when determining the priority of resources to sync. Currently, the only supported values are dfs (depth-first search) and round-robin
